Hello, all, sorry to stray from the topic at hand, but....  

I'm a java de=
veloper that has somehow ended up teaching a VB.NET class
(gasp).
Anyway, I=
'm having my class write an open-source application that tests
systems that=
 generate emails.
The program will store expected results (detailed lists o=
f emails) and
compare those to the actual results
(list of emails culled fr=
om inboxes).  So, this is more of an
integration test tool than a unit test=
 tool.

I was curious if there is anyone out there who would like to contri=
bute
to the requirements
or perhaps could point me to existing, comparable =
products (from which
we could steal requirements).
Email me directly at eos=
termueller@....

Thanks, 

--Erik Ostermueller
